awards.text: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 16 nominations.

fullplot: A man is chosen by his world's creator to undertake a momentous mission before an apocalyptic flood cleanses the world.
plot: A man is chosen by his world's creator to undertake a momentous mission before an apocalyptic flood cleanses the world.
title: Noah

tomatoes.consensus: With sweeping visuals grounded by strong performances in service of a timeless tale told on a human scale, Darren Aronofsky's Noah brings the Bible epic into the 21st century.
